thread.title: GAMING: Is Lewandowski still a Star Striker?
thread.title_full: GAMING: Is Lewandowski still a Star Striker?

title: GAMING: Is Lewandowski still a Star Striker?
text:
0 25-Mar-2017 16:00:00 The Polish striker is Bayern’s top goalscorer and he could help you win £250 with Goal Star Strikers? We are giving away £250 in Amazon Vouchers with Goal Star Strikers: our goal scorer prediction game. Just pick seven anytime goal scorers from this week’s list of Star Strikers. It’s free to play, just make your selection and register with Goal to qualify for the prize. 
PLAY FOR FREE 
Bayern host Bavarian rivals Augsburg after the international break, and Carlo Ancelotti’s men will be hoping to increase their 13-point lead at the top of the Bundesliga. Bayern have won the last three meetings with Augsburg 3-1. Robert Lewandowski scored twice in the reverse fixture earlier this season, and he has a good recent record against Augsburg, scoring five goals in three games against Manuel Baum’s side. The Polish striker now has 21 goals from 25 league appearances. He is the third top scorer in the league, two behind Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and one behind Cologne’s Anthony Modeste. He is currently scoring a goal every 99 minutes, he didn’t find the net against Monchengladbach so he is due a goal against Augsburg who have conceded 34 goals this season. Lewandowski has a 26% conversion rate with a shooting accuracy of 49%. 
Who are you backing this week? Make your goal scorer predictions, play Goal Star Strikers . Related
